title: Life with Mikey
description: He’s wacky, he’s wild, he’s everyone’s favorite child. It’s life with Mikey.
quote: Any chance of getting time off for good behavior?
altHero: Mikey (a young boy, standing on the stairs
alt1: Mikey’s sister being comforted by their parents
alt2: Mikey trying to look innocent while his sister rolls her eyes
alt3: the family decorating the Christmas tree
alt4: Mikey’s parents give each other a look
